description: Searches for available training plan offerings based on specified criteria. For more information about how to reserve GPU capacity for your SageMaker training jobs or SageMaker HyperPod clusters using Amazon SageMaker Training Plan , see ``CreateTrainingPlan ``.

parameters.name: DurationHours
parameters.description: The desired duration in hours for the training plan offerings.

parameters.name: TargetResources
parameters.description: The target resources (e.g., SageMaker Training Jobs, SageMaker HyperPod) to search for in the offerings. Training plans are specific to their target resource. A training plan designed for SageMaker training jobs can only be used to schedule and run training jobs. A training plan for HyperPod clusters can be used exclusively to provide compute resources to a cluster's instance group. (string) ---

nested_items.name: TrainingPlanOfferings
nested_items.description: A list of training plan offerings that match the search criteria.

nested_items.name: TrainingPlanOfferingId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for this training plan offering.

nested_items.name: TargetResources
nested_items.description: The target resources (e.g., SageMaker Training Jobs, SageMaker HyperPod) for this training plan offering.
A training plan designed for SageMaker training jobs can only be used to schedule and run training jobs.
A training plan for HyperPod clusters can be used exclusively to provide compute resources to a cluster's instance group.

nested_items.name: RequestedStartTimeAfter
nested_items.description: The requested start time that the user specified when searching for the training plan offering.

nested_items.name: RequestedEndTimeBefore
nested_items.description: The requested end time that the user specified when searching for the training plan offering.

nested_items.name: DurationHours
nested_items.description: The number of whole hours in the total duration for this training plan offering.

nested_items.name: DurationMinutes
nested_items.description: The additional minutes beyond whole hours in the total duration for this training plan offering.

nested_items.name: UpfrontFee
nested_items.description: The upfront fee for this training plan offering.

nested_items.name: CurrencyCode
nested_items.description: The currency code for the upfront fee (e.g., USD).

nested_items.name: ReservedCapacityOfferings
nested_items.description: A list of reserved capacity offerings associated with this training plan offering.

nested_items.name: InstanceType
nested_items.description: The instance type for the reserved capacity offering.

nested_items.name: InstanceCount
nested_items.description: The number of instances in the reserved capacity offering.

nested_items.name: AvailabilityZone
nested_items.description: The availability zone for the reserved capacity offering.

nested_items.name: DurationHours
nested_items.description: The number of whole hours in the total duration for this reserved capacity offering.

nested_items.name: DurationMinutes
nested_items.description: The additional minutes beyond whole hours in the total duration for this reserved capacity offering.

nested_items.name: StartTime
nested_items.description: The start time of the reserved capacity offering.

nested_items.name: EndTime
nested_items.description: The end time of the reserved capacity offering.
